stories.title: Select a Value from 'Select Value' Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select an option from the 'Select Value' dropdown so that I can choose the appropriate group option.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I click the dropdown next to 'Select Value', Then options including 'Group 1, option 2' should be visible.
Given the dropdown is expanded, When I select 'Group 1, option 2', Then this option should be displayed in the 'Select Value' field with the text 'Group 1, option 2'.

stories.title: Select Title from 'Select One' Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a title from the 'Select One' dropdown so that I can choose the appropriate title.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I click the dropdown next to 'Select One', Then options including 'Dr.', 'Mr.', and 'Mrs.' should be visible under 'PICK ONE TITLE'.
Given the dropdown is expanded, When I select 'Dr.', Then this option should be displayed in the 'Select One' field with the text 'Dr.'.

stories.title: Standard Multi Select Functionality
stories.description: As a user, I want to select multiple items from the standard multi-select box so that I can choose several options at once.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the multi-select box is visible, When I select 'Volvo' and 'Saab', Then both options should be highlighted in the list.
Given multiple selections are made, When I review the multi-select box, Then all selected items such as 'Volvo', 'Saab', and 'Opel' should be displayed together.
